headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Mettler-Toledo International (MTD) After Recent Share Price Strength?
summary: If you are wondering whether Mettler-Toledo International is priced attractively today, it helps to step back from the headline share price and look closely at what you are actually paying for. The stock last closed at US$1,491.99, with returns of 3.1% over 7 days, 7.1% over 30 days, 5.7% year to date, 17.7% over 1 year, a 4.2% decline over 3 years and 22.5% over 5 years. Taken together, these figures give a mixed picture of how sentiment has shifted over different time frames. Recent news...
